title: Amazon Is Selling Tiny Homes That Take As Little As 8 Hours To Build
text:
Need new sneaks? Head to Amazon. Running low on toilet paper? Check out Amazon. Want to buy a new house? Amazon, Amazon, Amazon.

Yup, you read that right. Amazon, the online shopping hotspot (...mecca, capital—whatever floats your boat), has taken the internet by storm with its selection of tiny homes, from sleek solar-powered studios to expandable dwellings to three-bedroom glass houses. And the options don't stop there. For all those DIY pros looking to make their own mini casa (hey, to each their own!), Amazon is also stocked with tiny house kits that come complete with step-by-step instructions and lots, if not all, of the necessary materials.

Built your kid's XL dollhouse and ready to get your hands dirty on a larger scale? These 10 top tiny house kits from Amazon are calling your name—and your shopping cart.
